content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <metadata>  <idinfo>   <citation>                           <citeinfo>                                  <origin>Bureau of Safety and Environmental Enforcement Gulf of Mexico OCS Region</origin>                                  <pubdate>20150302</pubdate>                                  <title>Outer Continental Shelf Oil and Natural Gas Wells - Gulf of Mexico Region NAD 27</title>                                  <geoform>vector digital data</geoform>                                  <pubinfo>                                      <pubplace>New Orleans, LA</pubplace>                                      <publish>Bureau of Safety and Environmental Enforcement Gulf of Mexico OCS Region</publish>                                  </pubinfo>                                  <onlink>http://www.data.bsee.gov/homepg/pubinfo/repcat/arcinfo/zipped/well.zip</onlink>                           </citeinfo>                 </citation>   <descript>    <abstract>This data set contains surface locations for oil and gas wells located in the Gulf of Mexico federal waters. Note: Wells are being added or modified continuously; obtaining updates of this database are required to know the true distribution of well data.Because GIS projection and topology functions can change or generalize coordinates, these GIS files are considered to be approximate and are NOT an OFFICIAL record.Contains the well surface locations as of March 2015.</abstract>    <purpose>The oil and gas well data is used for reference in maps showing coastal features in the Gulf of Mexico.  Current wells for the Bureau of Safety and Environmental Enforcement, Gulf of Mexico OCS Region; data is updated as needed. This is the well surface locations from TIMS GOM as of March 2015</purpose>   </descript>   <spdom>    <bounding>     <westbc>-97.202903</westbc>     <eastbc>-83.398249</eastbc>
